title: Government (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Housing, Planning and Local
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Housing, Planning and Local 
Government (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited housing planning local government (alteration name department title minister) order

title: Government (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: (2) This Order comes into operation on 30 September 2020.
text_raw:
2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 30 September 2020.

title: Government (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Tithíochta, Pleanála agus Rialtais Áitiúil and, in the 
English language, the Department of Housing, Planning and Local Government, 
is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Tithíochta, Rialtais Áitiúil 
agus Oidhreachta and, in the English language, to that of the Department of 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn tithiochta pleanala agus rialtais aitiuil english language department housing planning local government altered irish language roinn tithiochta rialtais aitiuil agus oidhreachta english language department housing local government heritage

title: Government (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Tithíochta, Pleanála agus Rialtais 
Áitiúil and, in the English language, the Minister for Housing, Planning and 
Local Government, is altered, in the Irish language to that of an tAire Tithíochta, 
Rialtais Áitiúil agus Oidhreachta and, in the English language, to that of the 
Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire tithiochta pleanala agus rialtais aitiuil english language minister housing planning local government altered irish language taire tithiochta rialtais aitiuil agus oidhreachta english language minister housing local government heritage

title: Government (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Housing, Planning and Local 
Government shall be construed as references to the Department 
of Housing, Local Government and Heritage; 

references to the Minister for Housing, Planning and Local 
Government shall be construed as references to the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [408] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

29 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [408]
